entry.content:
Kiwi is another kind of fruit.

These examples are frankly killing me.
entry.summary: Kiwi is another kind of fruit.

entry.title: Apples
entry.content:
An apple is sweet.

I’m not typing all of this, because who has time for that?

entry.title: Bananas
entry.content:
A banana is an edible fruit — botanically a berry - produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called “plantains”.
entry.summary: A banana is an edible fruit — botanically a berry - produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.
